<page title>: Cleverboxes - B2083HSD-B1 | Iiyama ProLite B2083HSD (19.5 inch) LED Backlit LCD Monitor 1000:1 250cd/m2 (1600x900) 5ms VGA/DVI (Black)
in the box: ProLite B2083HDS Monitor, Power cable, VGA (D-Sub) cable, DVI-D cable, Audio cable, Stand-base, Quick start guide, Safety guide
language selection: 10 languages (EN, FR, DE, IT, PL, ES, NL, JP, Chinese, RU)
user controls: Auto adjust, luminance (brightness, contrast), geometry (H. position, V. position, clock, phase), colour, OSD (H. position, V. position, timeout), language, recall, miscellaneous (sharpness, DDC/CI, display information, ACR, display mode, opening logo), input select, audio adjust (volume, mute) and 6 front controls (Power, Menu/ Select, Scroll up/Volume, Scroll down/ECO, Exit, Auto)
warranty: Two years on-site (plus 1 free year extra - registration required).
